reviewText:
[...] figuring maybe my girlfriend would like it. It was hardly erotic, generally predictable and dull. A tough blond tries to take a nice person's job away from her. It doesn't work out; the tough blond also manages to have sex with a few simple minded males. Nothing creative about this film. Simulated sex has the usual positions, front, back, some oral. Who cares?
This movie might have cast some real women in these roles, not the usual Playboy stereotypes. The script must have been written in 20 minutes.
